TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit RuntimeException extends Java.Lang.Exception

Docs.summary: RuntimeException is the superclass of all classes that represent exceptional conditions which occur as a result of executing an application in the VM.

remarks.para: RuntimeException is the superclass of all classes that represent exceptional conditions which occur as a result of executing an application in the VM. Unlike checked exceptions (exceptions where the type doesn't extend RuntimeException or ), the compiler does not require code to handle runtime exceptions.

Docs.summary: This API supports the Mono for Android infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
Docs.value: A which provides the declaring type.

remarks.para: This property is used to control virtual vs. non virtual method dispatch against the underlying JNI object. When this property is equal to the declaring type, then virtual method invocation against the JNI object is performed; otherwise, we assume that the method was overridden by a derived type, and perform non-virtual methdo invocation.
